name: Hispalis: Proyecto NoDo
summary:
Discover the free video game created by two Pokémon -loving fans from Seville that's taking Andalusia by storm.

Immerse yourself in the history of Hispalis , a post-apocalyptic Seville devastated by a massive pandemic, where Pokémon now reign supreme.

name: Highway Hijinks
summary: Highway Hijinks is a roguelike endless runner that takes place in a futuristic post-apocalyptic world controlled by a mysterious artificial intelligence. Discover wacky items, race against computer opponents, and upgrade your vehicle with powerful gadgets to get as far as you can.

name: Hide and Run
summary: In Hide and Run players are divided into two teams. Props are trying to hide long as possible with hunters trying to find them.

name: Hidden Things Forest Elves
summary: Travel to In this cozy hidden object game, you will explore 2 settlements of forest elves who are engaged in all sorts of cool activities. There are many cute and funny stories happening in the forest, you just need to look closely.

name: Hidden Memories
summary:
What happened last night? Dive into your memories to unravel the mystery.

Hidden Memories is the ninth game of the Hidden Town series by Dark Dome.

name: Hidden Paws
summary: It's winter and cats are still outside. Cold and alone. Find them and bring them home.

name: High Above
summary: High Above is a small rooftop-building game about finding peace in the skies. Design and grow your perfect rooftop retreat, from vibrant Cuban courtyards to modern urban hideaways. Watch the world come to life around you, at your own pace, in your own little oasis.

name: Hide&Seek
summary: Hide&Seek is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame, where you explore Ann's dreams. Aditionally, the PC in her room can be used to receive mail, collect wallpapers and listen to music.

name: Hibernaculum
summary:
A survival horror RPG by Wormwood Studios

Old School Dungeon Crawl/Survival Horror experience meets speculative fiction inspired modern take on the genre.

name: Hina-chan Breaker: 2nd Break
summary: A doujin game by ISY based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Highway Acceleroid Booster
summary:
Highway Acceleroid Booster is a GZDoom gameplay mod where you play as a robot girl that's part car and part super fighting robot. Armed primarily with mobility, a series of battle chips for extra combat data, and a variety of utensils installed into her gauntlets, she zips from place to place to gather additional combat data. And to help out wherever she's needed, admittedly. Helping feels nice.

Inspired by Mega Man X, gameplay feel is a little bit more cartoony and high-tech than usual, with some pretty outlandish weapons doing some silly functions.. Designed to act as a complement for sci-fi/space-age mapsets, the gameplay mod acts as a direct contrast with High Noon Drifter. Rather than being very simple and low-tech, this mod is a little bit more complicated and hi-tech.
If you've been looking for a mod where you can play as a robot, android, gynoid, or you've been looking for something to compliment Stardate 20X7, this might be up your alley.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Himatsubushi-hen
summary: A port of the remade version of the original fifth chapter of Higurashi When They Cry for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Hidden Capybaras with Orange
summary: Set out on an adventurous journey, searching for capybaras with orange during both day and night in this exceptional hidden object game.

name: Hips N Noses
summary: HIPS N' NOSES is a café management simulation! In a sleepless world, Mela is the only one who dreams. She runs a café that restores lost memories. Serve guests by day, battle in nightmares by night to collect the memory flower, customize your café, and become the most renowned owner!

name: Hidden Shapes: Lovely Cats
summary: If you love cats, you are in the right place! Relax and have fun with beautiful puzzles of cute kittens having fun, hand-drawn, created exclusively for you to rescue your tranquility and be amazed by a beautiful art for each puzzle solved!

name: Hina-chan's Big Trade! Millionaire Lunch
summary: With no offers to be in the mainline games, Hina-chan finally finds herself with no more than a single cucumber in her fridge. Help her by searching for and trading all sorts of items to various humans and youkai to get enough food to make her lunch a rich one!

name: Hi Hi Puffy AmiYumi: World Tour
summary: World Tour is a new game from Hi Hi Puffy AmiYumi where you have to explore the entire word.

name: Highschool Romance
summary: Can you find love as the only boy in an all-girls school? Find out, in this slice-of-life visual novel game with multiple endings.

name: Hidden & Dangerous 2: Sabre Squadron
summary: Sabre Squadron introduced nine new single player missions, seven new multi-player maps, and a now finished, death-match map called "Poland", which had been featured in the game's intro and was titled "London" and available for play in its unfinished state before this release, new weapons: the RPzB 54, the MAS-36, the G43, a suppressed P08 and a Harrington & Richardson Mk VI flare pistol; the ability to hold your breath while looking through a telescopic sight, a co-operative multi-player mode, along with access to the original Hidden and Dangerous 2 missions through Sabre Squadron's interface.

name: High Five!
summary: High Five! is a game about resistance, mind confusion and concentration, but also about a gloved hand in the middle of space. A very arcade-like game suitable for both casual and hardcore gamers. Your goal is to answer how many fingers are visible on the screen without letting the timer run out.

name: Hitogata Happa
summary: Shoot 'em up with the 3rd game in the Gundemonium Collection series. Hitogata Happa is considered one of the hardest doujin style shooters ever! – Unlike the first two games, Hiitogata Happa is a vertical scrolling upward shooter, the action in this game is a visual mish-mash of weaponry that will give your senses a total overload. Threatened by an invading army who is terrorizing the land, Rosa enlisted the magic of a witch, Kreutzer – who has charmed her own army of magic dolls, each with extreme power and crazy weapons. Use these dolls to take revenge on the invaders as you blast through six, intense stages. Choose from twelve playable characters (four unlockable), each with their own special abilities, and unlock secret game features.

name: Hibiscus Red
summary: Almost classic point and click adventure game

name: Him
summary:
In the music galaxy, a prince awaits an attack from outsiders.

Thousands of spaceships entered the galaxy to mine what does not belong to them! Him is a third person casual game where the player runs and jump between home planets to destroy the invading space pirates and their spaceships under a limited time before they mine the lands.

You will have the option to choose between different instruments. Each instrument represent a different shooting style for the player. Choose carefully which shooting style you want to play with based on what goals you want to accomplish.

name: High Steel
summary:
This is no time to feel dizzy. As you balance precariously on a narrow steel girder, hundreds of feet above the hard concrete below, a head for heights is a must. There's a skyscraper to be built, and the Splitters, Crawlers, and metal-munching Gremlins are in hot pursuit. You step over the slippery remains of your workmate's lunch, hurl your spanner at a menacing shadow, and curse the day you became a high steel worker. 
 
The sixth floor is complete. The huge crane delivers the next girder, just as a brick smashes into your hard hat. Things might not be so bad if you could just find your sandwiches. 
 
Can you overcome all of the obstacles and dangers confronting you to tower above the city streets below, or will you end up splatting the pavement like raspberry jam? 
 
Almost unheard of! A completely original arcade game that will keep you hooked to your computer for hours upon hours of frantic high altitude addictive fun. 
 
Terrific graphics, sampled sound and a great sense of humor make High Steel one of the best new games in ages.

name: Hidden Legends
summary: Discover a magical world full of secrets and hidden treasures!

name: Hikibyou 2
summary: Hikibyou 2 is an action/adventure platfomer with puzzle and stealth elements. A bit of what differentiates itself from the first title in the series, Hikikomori No Chuunibyou, is this successor's less realistic approach and more atmospheric vibe. Levels are once again open-ended with the story directing the player.

name: Hissatsu Pachinko Station 2
summary: The second Hissatsu Pachinko Station game and the sixth game overall in the "Hissatsu" meta-series.

name: Hit the Button
summary:
Hit the Button is a platform game in which the main objective is to press all the buttons in each level. It is a game comprised of jumping and platforming, puzzles and brain teasers.
Each level presents a challenge as it has different design ranging from easy levels where you will have to perform simple jumps and difficult levels with more complex jumps, with puzzles and riddles.

name: Hidden Kitten
summary: Dive whisker-first into "Hidden Kitten," a purr-fectly delightful hidden object game! Follow Charly the cat's dream escapades, and search for hidden objects in charming black and white hand-drawn scenes. Prepare for a paw-sitively un-fur-gettable experience!

name: Hidden Shy Cats & Dogs Bundle
summary: Find shy musician cats and dogs in this charming bundle! Enjoy cozy hidden-object gameplay as you discover adorable animals and create your own musical mix!

name: Hillthorn
summary: Explore a mysterious mountains to find a missing person in this card-based investigation game.

name: Hitman 2 Christmas Game
summary: The Hitman 2 Christmas Game is a promotional flash game developed by the now-defunct Noise Media, and released by Eidos Interactive to promote Hitman 2: Silent Assassin during the holiday season.

name: Hiroshi
summary: A romantic and adventure visual novel where your decisions are very important.

name: High School Private Tutor
summary: You’re a gifted college student carefully balancing your studies with a part-time tutoring gig until an offer lands in your lap that just might be too good to be true. When your seemingly shy high school tutee falls head over heels for you during the very first lesson together, you’re suddenly thrust into a situation where your head is at war with your heart and your future may just be on the line if word of it ever gets out.

name: Hightail
summary: Hightail is a fast-paced 2D platformer for the Game Boy Color. The game stars Chili, a plucky mouse with a knack for treasure hunting. If there's any chance of encountering treasure, Chili will run, dash, swim, crouch, and twirl their way through any challenge. Hightail takes inspiration from the platforming greats of Wario Land, Sonic, Pizza Tower, Celeste, and more.

name: High Clouds
summary: Jump from island to island, hook yourself, hang-glide, and fight pirates. "High Clouds" is a 3D platformer about the journey of a dog in a red coat through flying islands. Try to reach the highest islands!

name: Hitler no Fukkatsu: Top Secret
summary: The Nazis are back - they have survived the war and, led by their supreme leader Weizmann, they have now come up with the most evil and horrific plan in history! Hitler, the man who the allies thought was dead, has been revived and his fractions of hell are about to take over the world once again. The allies decide to send one of their best men, Super Joe, to counter the threat - but he is soon captured and Radd Spencer is dispatched to rescue him and complete the primary mission.

name: HiPurrLand
summary: Hundreds of cats and fifteen brand-new levels await your exploration!

name: Hitman 3: Seven Deadly Sins Act 7 - Wrath
summary:
HITMAN 3: Seven Deadly Sins takes you deep into the mind of Agent 47. Get exclusive sin-themed suits and take on brand new challenges to unlock unique rewards. Can you resist all seven sins?

This content pack includes Act 7: Wrath. All seven Acts can be purchased together in the Seven Deadly Sins Collection.

name: Hiveswap: Act 2
summary: Joey Claire is stranded on a planet of alien teenagers, armed with her best dancin' shoes and a sylladex full of pogs. It’s up to her to survive on the dangerous planet of Alternia and get home with the help of her new friend Xefros, a novice at telekinesis and a fairly decent rapper.

name: Hidden Animals Find : Detective Neko
summary: Neko and Watson follow several trails to solve the case. What awaits you at the end of the case as you search for the many animals and archenemies hidden within the various aspects of the city?

name: High School Dirty Secrets
summary: High School Dirty Secrets is a horror/puzzle adventure where Kasuga wakes up locked inside her high school with no memory of how she got there. As she searches for a way out, strange and unsettling events unfold, leading her to uncover dark secrets hidden within the school's walls.

name: Highway Traffic Pro
summary:
Highway Traffic Racing
Fast Car Driving
Extreme Road Challenge

name: Hidden Expedition: Neptune's Gift - Collector's Edition
HiPanda
summary: Based on 3D and VR technology, we simulate and restore the panda's home scene, panda model, and panda's daily behavior, so that visitors can immerse themselves in the panda's life through VR, and watch the pandas close to the panda, interact with the pandas, feed and so on.

name: Highrisers
summary: An Urban Survival RPGCrafting, Exploring and Defending in a desolate metropolis haunted by the mysterious dreamers.Lead a team of 4 survivors through this urban desert of skyscrapers and high-rises, where the dimly lit streets are crowded with the mutated victims of an unstopable disease that forever trapped them in a dream.

name: High Functioning
summary: You smoked too much and now you are being weird at the function. Guide the words from thoughts into reality with your mouse.

name: Hidden Cats 7: Cookie Town
summary: Explore the sweet gingerbread town while finding cute cats and paint black - white locations with colored paints.

name: Hike Haven
summary: Hike Haven – A Breathtaking Exploration Adventure!

name: High Cars 2
summary: Sky-high racing

name: High on Racing
summary: High On Racing is an unique Retro Arcade Style Tactical Racing Game that will warp you into the sky to race against the time.

name: Hitman World of Assassination Celebrity Bundle
summary:
Unlock three Celebrity Packs that include inspired cosmetics and permanent access to corresponding Elusive Target Arcade contracts.

Take your time to eliminate:
• The Undying
• The Drop
• The Splitter

The cosmetics include:
• The Ephemeral Suit with Eye Patch
• Kronstadt Explosive Pen (Gen 2)
• The Club Boom DJ Suit
• The Club Boom 12" Vinyl Sampler
• The Splitter Boxer Suit
• The Splitter Kukri Knife
• Multiple Freelancer Safehouse cosmetics
• And more

Each of these Elusive Target Arcade contracts has their own set of challenges and methods that further fan the creative flame in taking them down. Continue to perfect your take-downs as Agent 47 and test your skills.

name: Hidden Object Adventure Bundle
summary: Get a captivating collection of three exciting hidden object games with gripping plots and unexpected twists!

name: Hidden Collection 2 HD - Fun Seek and Find Hidden Object Puzzles
Hime to Inyoku no Testament
summary:
In Winstol Kingdom's dark province of Woodfall—

A land where ominous clouds have sealed the sky, devoid of sunlight for a whole century, feared as a "cursed realm" forsaken by the gods, is governed by the so-called "Monster Lord," Gran Woodfall.

Secluded in a timeworn castle deep within an enshrouded forest, Gran is a bona fide monster, unaging due to a curse, who has lived for a century.

Summoned to this lair of monstrosity is Princess Sylphia of Winstol, offered as Gran's bride-to-be as per an unholy pact between him and the King of Winstol. She is the "cursed princess," confined to the royal castle for carrying a calamity-invoking curse since her youth.

But that very curse is the key to Gran's quest.

"Everything is in place.
Ring the chimes, mark the passage of time, and fill the vessel with the curse.
Now—let the 'ceremony' commence."

Gran has lived through a century, fueled only by the desire to reclaim his lost love taken by an unjust fate. Having gained the necessary power from Sylphia, he commences the 'ritual' alongside the condemned monsters he has summoned to his castle.

In a forest shrouded in mist and darkness, the curtain rises on a dark, sensual rite within this cursed citadel—.

name: Hikaru's Cube
summary: An old-school difficult 8-bit 2D platformer where the main objective is to cast a block in front of your player to use in creative ways to get through levels - make bridges, stairs, use it to fall safely from heights and block enemy projectiles. Hikaru's Cube offers classic arcade gameplay that mixes elements from Super Meat Boy and Bubble Bobble.

name: Hit Idol
summary: Hit Idol is a cozy drag&drop indie puzzle game by Toraka about managing a high school idol band club, featuring twelve character-based story arcs and cute pixel art. Train in various musical mini games to reach Star-Filled Sky Festival and bring justice to Teacher's old enemies!

name: HikiDama
summary: Platform through a variety of scenarios, or compete in races using the best vehicle man could invent, a metal ball.

name: Hierosaga Overture
summary: Enter the tomb of the Pharaess and tactically maneuver through a plethora of challenges and monster-filled gauntlets in this homage to strategy roguelikes of the 90s.

name: Hitman 3: Deluxe Pack
summary:
The Hitman 3: Deluxe Pack adds new content to Hitman 3.

- Deluxe Escalation Contracts
- Deluxe Suits and Items
- Digital Soundtrack
- Digital “World of HITMAN” Book
- Director Commentary (Mission Introduction)

The Deluxe Pack is also included in the Hitman 3: Deluxe Edition.

name: Hidden Mysteries: Titanic
summary: Titanic: The Game takes place aboard the R.M.S. Titanic on her fateful maiden voyage across the Atlantic. The player’s avatar is a young socialite, Margaret Ashley, one of the fortunate unfortunates who sailed on Titanic and survived. Throughout the course of the game, Margaret is presented with sets of puzzles and obstacles that she must overcome to progress the timeline from April 10th - the date Titanic left Southampton Dock – to the 15th, when she sunk beneath the waves.

name: HigherLower
summary:
Higher Lower. A simple game that can be played anytime, anywhere.

Instructions

Click the Up or Down icons to select whether the next number displayed will be Higher or Lower than the number displayed on the left of the number rack.

Can you guess them all?

Cool Studios thanks you in advance for your interest in this Higher Lower Game

name: Hidden Gems, Hidden Secrets
summary:
The members of the Hidden Gems Of Poetry Group are close. Even the move from internet forum to web server can't break their bond. But heartbreaking news could mean the end of things as they know it.

A short game made for SeedComp 2023. The writing is by Naomi Norbez, and the game was programmed by Josh Grams.

Please note that Hidden Gems, Hidden Secrets contains discussion of sexual harassment/coercion, and people in positions of power taking advantage of their place.

name: Himegimi Detective
summary: Sayla Limehult, First Princess to the Kingdom of Ratania, shall set off for the far-away land of Japan to learn about the wider world and her role within it. As both a princess, and a world-class detective!

name: Highrise
summary: Highrise is your virtual home, where over 50 million users connect, play, and express their digital selves. Create a unique avatar, design custom spaces, and join vibrant communities for gaming, chatting, and events. With creativity, and a thriving community, Highrise offers endless possibilities.

name: Hidden Cats in Paris
summary: "Meow meow meow mes amies! A short and pleasant experience in beautiful Paris! Start with a monochromatic illustration, relax, and find all the cats one by one to reveal the final colored art. Advanced levels and extra bonuses. More than 680 hidden objects to find!"

name: Hiking Simulator 2018
summary: Put on your hiking boots and get ready to explore a gigantic winter landscape!

name: Hindsight
summary:
Enter and explore memories from long ago. Relive moments frozen in time.

Hindsight is a narrative exploration game spanning the entirety of a woman’s life, from birth to present day, as she tries to make sense of it all. Revisit her childhood home, sort through personal belongings, and step through windows to memories frozen in time.

name: High Sidin': Hyphy Edition
summary: HighSidin’: Hyphy Edition is a game about Bay Area dance battles. Navigate through the ranks of the National Sideshow League (NSL), traversing well known cities in the Bay Area. Make your way through the campaign by dancing in 4 unique sideshow tournaments, each with their own look, and aesthetic. Battle with friends in the couch multiplayer mode. Refine your skills against opponents in practice mode. Go from local to well known star and become the best dancer in the bay area.

name: H.I.C.H.
summary: H.I.C.H. is an online action game! Show and prove your skills in PvP shootouts, PvE missions, online drift and street races among other players-rebels and earn respect among them!

name: Hidden Objects Fantasy Games
summary: Become overwhelmed by enchantment by playing this excellent fantasy game! It is a final hour to discover hidden things in beautiful pictures of fantasy world! Join the little forest fairy in this amazing mystic fantasy game! Let your imagination go wild while you lose yourself in awesome fairy tales of the enchanted forest!

name: Hide and Seek: Story of Dorothy
summary: Dorothy, who fell asleep in the closet while playing Hide and Seek. Coming out of the closet after waking up, she couldn't remember why she was there in the first place. In order to solve this mystery, Dorothy started to explore the house.

name: High Entropy: Challenges
summary:
High Entropy: Challenges is a free, action-adventure FPS consisting of a beginning, 15 levels, a default ending and a special ending if you finish with a 100% score in all levels.

Use computers (via GUIs or the command line), unlock doors, crawl through vents, fight enemies head on or find other ways to neutralize or avoid them...

name: Hivecraft
summary: Breed bees, collect nectar and make honey! But remember that there may be a bear lurking nearby, who will not miss the opportunity to eat a sweet treat.

name: Hidden Shapes: Animals + Lovely Cats
summary: Hidden Shapes: Lovely Cats + Animals is a collection with two beautiful and relaxing minimalist hand-drawn jigsaw puzzles that have two options to choose, cats or animals in general.

name: Hisshou Pachinko: Pachi-Slot Kouryoku Series Vol. 9: CR Fever Captain Harlock
Hitchhike Wars
summary: Hitchhike Wars is an adrenaline-fueled shooter game that combines high-speed hitchhiking, intense car combat and strategic weapon upgrades. Players embark on a thrilling journey, racing against time to hitch rides, unlock powerful weapons, and engage in PvP battles with other hitchhikers on the road.

name: Hidden Paws Mystery
summary:
What is this cat doing here? And where are his friends?
Explore strange and beautiful islands to find all the little kittens hidden there.

name: Hidden Cats in Spooky Town
summary: It's Helloween Time! Do you choose Trick or Cat? Enjoy and find all the hidden cats one by one on the Spooky Town to reveal the final colored art. Play through different modes, find special cats, and unlock bonus levels! More than 700 hidden objects to find!

name: High Cars 3
summary: Sky-high racing

name: Hidden Through Time: Viking Tales
summary: The Viking Tales DLC adds 10 levels to the campaign and 400 viking themed objects for level creators to make amazing levels with!

name: Hidden Cats in London
summary: Meow meow meow dear friends! Kitties are hidden in London, let's find them all. A short and pleasant experience! Start with a Beautiful monochromatic illustration, relax and find all the cats one by one to reveal the final colored art. Play through different modes and find special cats too!

name: HiHi
summary: Jump up, don't fall.

name: Hi, How Are You
summary: Hi, How Are You is a 3D platformer based on the art and music of the late Daniel Johnston, and starring his well-known character, Jerimiah the Innocent. Jerimiah has been transformed into a frog by an evil force and must reverse the curse to rescue the love of his life. Help him regain his true form by outrunning, outsmarting, and outmaneuvering his enemies through increasingly tough obstacles in a bizarre, otherworldly universe. It's not enough just to find the exit — Jerimiah has to hop on every green square in the stage to open the way forward, and each labyrinthine level contains special bonus squares as well. With 40 different stages and 4 different forms, you've got your work cut out for you!

name: High Noon Revolver
summary: High Noon Revolver is a 2D Action Shooter; blast your way across 3 layers of platforming, collecting gold and obtaining upgrades helping you go from puny to powerhouse. Play as a cast of colorful characters, each with unique weapons and abilities!

name: High Pines
summary: Photograph your way through High Pines Summer Camp and uncover the mystery of the campers’ disappearance.

name: Hitman 2
summary: Travel the globe and track your targets across exotic sandbox locations in Hitman 2. From sun-drenched streets to dark and dangerous rainforests, nowhere is safe from the world’s most creative assassin, Agent 47 in the ultimate spy thriller story.

name: Hitman 2: Santa Fortuna
summary: Explore the remote village of Santa Fortuna, entrenched deep inside the lush Colombian rainforest and located at the foot of the infamous Delgado mansion.

name: Hitman 2: New York
summary:
New York City is the most populous city in the United States of America, located in the state of New York. A thriving metropolis, it is home to many famous landmarks as well as Providence associates.
The mission Golden Handshake takes place in the city, located exclusively inside the Milton-Fitzpatrick bank. 47 must eliminate Athena Savalas and acquire a Providence data core from the bank's heavily-protected vault.
This is the first expansion included in the expansion pass.

name: Hitman 2: GOTY Legacy Pack
summary: This is the full Legacy Pack, which includes all remastered locations and missions from Season 1 and The Game of The Year Upgrade. The bundle includes: - All content from Season 1 - The Patient Zero Bonus campaign - 3 Themed Escalation Contracts - 3 extra Outfits - 3 extra Weapons

name: Higurashi Umineko Card Battle Team
summary: Higurashi Umineko Card Battle Team is a mobile strategy card game featuring many characters from Higurashi When They Cry and Umineko When They Cry as collectible cards in varying art styles, event themes, and poses.

name: Hiryuu no Ken Densetsu GB: Real Version
Hitozuma Kouzen Chijoku Densha: Ketai Hitotsu de Osawari Soku Hame Shihoudai Tanin no Tsuma o Nenchaku Tanezuke Netori
summary: A visual novel from Miel.

name: HimeYoku: A Sacrifice of Lust and Grace
summary: Hell-bent on vengeance, Caldo single-handedly topples the royal throne of Solide, capturing the king and the princess and working their ruin through his dark contracts with demons. A visual novel about hate and revenge... and possibly redemption.

name: Hive Mind
summary: Hive Mind is a hectic hive management co-op, from 1-4 players. You and your bee friends are desperately trying to fill the remaining honey cells before winter arrives while simultaneously keeping the hives morale above the brink.

name: High Heat Baseball 2000
summary:
High Heat Major League Baseball was a series of baseball computer games, released on PlayStation, Xbox, PlayStation 2 and PC. There were six annual versions of the game released, started with High Heat Baseball 1999, and ending with High Heat Major League Baseball 2004.

The game, featuring the official licensed team and player names from all 30 MLB teams, was created by games company 3DO which subsequently filed for bankruptcy in 2003 soon after the release of the final version of the series, High Heat Major League Baseball 2004. In August 2003, Microsoft purchased the rights to the High Heat franchise from 3DO, however, Microsoft has yet to develop a new title in the series.

High Heat was traditionally known for possessing more simulation-style qualities than competitors World Series Baseball, All Star Baseball, or Triple Play Baseball, but frequently lagged behind in graphical quality. At the core of High Heat′s gameplay was its batter-pitcher interface, which was often hailed as the most realistic of its era.

name: Hispalis Cardgame
summary: Developed by the creators of the original fangame, this app will be updated and growing every month with new updates.

name: Himegoto
summary: Nevertheless, if you insist on uncovering their special secrets... consider this your warning. You will meet young women, each with their own hidden mysteries, and soon find yourself drawn into a whirlpool of secrets. Oh, do be careful. In this academy, one must never "pry into secrets."

name: Hiyoko Fighter
summary: In Hiyoko Fighter you control a little chick who must collect eggs dropped by chickens while being chased by snakes. It takes a couple of cues from Pac-Man as it has tunnels you can walk into to warp to another part of the screen when you’re feeling trapped. There are 3 eggs laid by the chickens, a white one that gives you points, a red one enables temporary invincibility and the ability to kill the green snakes, and a yellow egg will advance you to the next level.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Matsuri: Ch.3 Watanagashi-hen
summary: A remake of the original second chapter of Higurashi When They Cry.

name: Hidden Object Bundle
summary: Find, explore, and relax in a world full of cute details!

name: Hidden Cats in Christmas
summary: Explore charming Christmas scenes inspired by global traditions, with plenty of cats and characters. Enjoy a relaxing, cozy journey—now with bonus stages featuring a new progressive colorization effect that gradually reveals the map’s colors as you play.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Ch.4 Himatsubushi-hen
summary: Akasaka Mamoru, a detective is sent to Hinamizawa to rescue Inukai Toshiki, the grandson of a government official, who is taken hostage. While waiting for Makino, he meets a younger Furude Rika at the bus stop.

name: Higgs Boson: Particle Puzzle
summary: Higgs Boson: Particle Puzzle is a relaxing and minimalist puzzle game where the player must rotate pieces to assemble a particle accelerator.

name: Higurashi When They Cry Hou: Ch.5 Meakashi
summary:
Higurashi When They Cry is a sound novel. The music, backgrounds and characters work together to create a world that is the stage of a novel for the user to read. They laugh and cry and get angry. The user takes the point of view of the protagonist to experience the story.

Nevertheless, this is a game, not a novel. As the player, you will be able to unravel the mystery surrounding the events in the game as the scenarios unfold.

name: Hissatsu Ura-Kagyou
summary:
Hissatsu Ura Kagyō is an action game set in Japan during the Edo period, inspired by the popular Hissatsu Series historical drama (jidaigeki). The player controls Keijirō Teitō, who by day is a well-liked doctor in his hometown. However, by night, he takes up his sword and exacts bloody vengeance on the wicked and the corrupt.

During the daytime, the player can move about Keijirō's hometown, speaking with people to gather information, visiting the many shops such as a restaurant and a bookstore, and perhaps even getting into a fight now and then. Returning to his home allows him to save the game, view and accept the current job requests, and consult with his father about a variety of topics.

During the night, the game becomes more like a stealth action game such as Tenchu. Controlling either Keijirō or one of several other characters, the player must continue to gather information about the targets for each request while evading detection, eventually reaching the main target who must be killed. Successfully completing requests will earn money and reputation.

name: Highway to Heal
summary: Highway to Heal is a top-down arcade driving adventure game set in an open world solarpunk city. You play as Jakub & Mishra, a paramedic duo, on duty to rescue locals while facing traffic and big weather events. The goal is to bring the patient safe and sound as fast as possible.

name: Hiss
summary: A twist on an old classic.

name: Hidden Cat Memories
summary: Explore a surreal hand-drawn world in Hidden Cat Memories. Find cat souls and help them remember their favorite moments with their humans. Each discovery transforms the cat and reveals her touching memory. Immerse yourself in this unique hidden object adventure.

name: Hi no Tori: Houou-hen
summary: Phoenix is about reincarnation. Each story generally involves a search for immortality, embodied by the blood of the eponymous bird of fire, which, as drawn by Tezuka, resembles the Fenghuang. The blood is believed to grant eternal life, but immortality in Phoenix is either unobtainable or a terrible curse, whereas Buddhist-style reincarnation is presented as the natural path of life. Hi no Tori is an Action game, developed and published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 1987.

name: Hidden Harbor 2 Top-Down 3D
summary: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Hide In Dummy
summary: "Hide in Dummy" is a multiplayer game where players hide among dummies or become the seeker. The seeker changes every 30 seconds, and the last player standing wins. Dummies spawn when players are caught, creating chaos. Use strategy to survive or outwit the seeker.

name: Higurashi Daybreak
summary:
Higurashi Daybreak is a doujin game developed and distributed by Twilight Frontier with the cooperation of 07th Expansion. Unlike the original sound novels, the game is a two-on-two versus third-person shooter based on the system of the Mobile Suit Gundam VS Series.

Characters from "Higurashi no Naku Koro ni" utilize weapons such as bats and hatchets in battles set in Hinamizawa. The scenario is an original work by Ryukishi07 and does not feature the horror elements present in the source material. Despite being a doujin game, it employs the same voice actors as the original drama CDs and anime adaptation, which is unusual for fan-made games.

name: Hints Hunter
summary: Hints Hunter is an easy, casual game that you can play anytime and anywhere.

name: Hidden Cats In White Sand Village
summary: Find cute cats in White Sand Village. Can you find them all? Meow Meow...Kittens are calling you！

name: Hidden Cats & Pandas
summary: Hidden Cats & Pandas is a hidden object game. The player's task is to find all the cats and pandas that are hidden in different parts of the map.

name: HIND: The Russian Combat Helicopter Simulation
summary: A flight simulator.

name: Hijack Overdrive
summary: Hijack Overdrive is a fast-paced action game where you steal enemy vehicles mid-combat to fight back. Jump from gunship to gunship in order to pilot your makeshift fleet through the enemy forces. It's a unique genre-mix of Platformer, Shootemup, and a bit of Towerdefense.

name: Hidden Expedition: Smithsonian Castle
summary: From Eipix, in partnership with Big Fish and the Smithsonian Institution, comes the epic continuation of the Hidden Expedition series! Your old buddy and H.E.L.P. operative Sam calls you in to investigate a strange anomaly at the Smithsonian Castle. You soon learn there's more to this anomaly than meets the eye, and H.E.L.P's reach stretches back to the Smithsonian's historic founding. Unlock the secrets of time travel as you follow the clues into the Smithsonian Castle's Civil War past.

name: Hidden
summary: "HIdden" is a first person horror decryption game. The player will play the role of Wang xuanzuo and enter the school complex at night to help the teacher get the information. How many hidden secrets are there in this building? Can you find the key and open the door to escape?

name: Hidden Shapes: Black Skull
summary: Relax with beautiful hand-drawn puzzles inspired by the world of Pirates, created exclusively for you to have fun and be amazed by beautiful art with each puzzle solved!

name: Himehibi: Princess Days Portable
summary: A port of Himehibi: Princess Days

name: Hidden Space Station Top-Down 3D
summary: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Hitman World of Assassination: Part One
summary: Step into the shoes of Agent 47 and explore the six iconic locations from HITMAN (2016) in Part One of HITMAN World of Assassination.

name: Hidden in my Paradise
summary: Hide objects, decorate, and replicate cool snaps in this cozy hidden-object game where you can create little paradises!

name: Himmapan Marshmello Saga
summary: Feed, train and take care of your virtual pets (“Nons”) to help them grow into the multiple evolution paths available in the game. Play multiple mini-games to train your Nons and compete against your friend’s Himmapan mini-game scores. Mini-games also earn you coin rewards, which can be redeemed to customize your Nonster and its home, or simply to feed it tasty meals!

name: Hidden Object Bundle 4 in 1
summary:
This 4-in-1 bundle includes 4 Hidden Object games: 
 
- Stray Souls: Dollhouse Story 
- House of 1,000 Doors: The Palm of Zoroaster 
- Dark Strokes: Sins of the Fathers 
- Eternal Journey: New Atlantis

name: Hidden Cats: Ice Cream Day
summary: Dive into the enchanting world of "Hidden Cats - Ice Cream Day" a hidden object game where your mission is to uncover every cat hidden within stunning hand-painted artwork. Let your keen eye and curiosity guide you through this captivating journey.

name: Higher Than Mush
summary: A stimulating, yet deeply chill, psychedelic action roguelite platformer. Master your reflexes, collect dopamine, and chase Nirvana... or overdose trying.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Mei
summary: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Mei is a smartphone-based gacha game released on September 3, 2020. The game has a new story written by Kanou Kiichi, with help from Ryukishi07.

name: Hired Explorer
summary: Game from STUDIO-Van

name: Hidden Life
summary: College, a fun time for some, a bad time for others. All have hopes and dreams, but some demons pull them down to a hole they can't climb out of. Life changes based on the smallest things, and those who suffer can sometimes see a light to help escape the darkness, or be forever wrapped in it.

name: Higurashi When They Cry Hou: Ch.7 Minagoroshi
summary: Higurashi When They Cry is a sound novel. The music, backgrounds and characters work together to create a world that is the stage of a novel for the user to read. They laugh and cry and get angry. The user takes the point of view of the protagonist to experience the story.

name: Hidden Harbor Top-Down 3D
summary: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Hidden Caves
summary: Find the caves elements that are hidden on the map.

name: Hideko
summary:
Hideko is a short mystery game about nature.

Explore the rules of a small sandbox world to create new objects, plants and other forms of life! Discover special situations and interactions to earn stars to increase your inventory-size and unlock new areas.

name: Hi Hi Puffy AmiYumi Treasure Island
summary:
Yumi Yoshimura and Kazuo "Kaz" Harada thought about going on a vacation and this island is the perfect place where they can recreate and having fun. After they arrived on this island they found out that this island is loaded with treasure, so the adventure just started. Our girls just started their new adventure and you will have to help them to find the treasure, to stay back of any danger that can appear here on this island, because we heard about that on this island were some pirates and a lot of other wild animals that can harm our girls.

As you can see in the right corner, you have a counter that counts how much treasure, diamonds and crystals you found out and at the same time you have to be careful about that clock, because you have to move fast if you like to catch the bonus at the end of the game. You have some weapons if you need, and we encourage you to use them because a lot of animals will try to kill you; press the numbers 1,2,3,4,5,6 to see what's happening if somebody is trying to stop you.

name: Hidden Nature
summary: Each level offers a new way to discover the hidden dark side of your peers. Will your friendship stay intact or become corrupted like so many others?

name: Hidden Cats: Pirates
summary: Dive into the enchanting world of "Cats & Seek - Pirates" a hidden object game where your mission is to uncover every cat hidden within stunning hand-painted artwork. Let your keen eye and curiosity guide you through this captivating journey.

name: Hi-iro no Kakera Aizou-ban: Akane-iro no Tsuioku
summary: The PlayStation 3 version makes use of the graphical system in Hakuoki: Junsouroku. The sprites move when they talk. The new edition also includes new scenarios, chapter summaries, and a couple of girls will come out to explain about the wrong decisions players made when they get a bad end.

name: Highway Drifter: Hajwala Simulator
summary: Hajwala isn’t typical drifting, it’s a vibe straight from the Gulf streets. Drift the Arab way, go into high speed and lose control on the highway. It’s all about sliding sideways with style on highways and open roads, showing oﬀ your skills while staying in full control. It’s loud, wild, and a lot of fun. In Highway Drifter: Hajwala Simulator you get to feel all that energy. Whether you’re cruising the desert or speeding through mountain roads, Customize everything during gameplay, your car is all about your style. Pick your favorite shade of color and choose your tint level, switch up the rims, and mix and match front and back bumpers to match your style. You can even customize your license plate to make it totally yours.

name: Hinekuremono no Gakuen Seishun Monogatari: Ore to Kanojo no Reversible
Hidden Pass
summary: Hidden Pass is a tactical turn-based RPG with base management that blends tactics with fascinating visual effects. The game sets in unique technomagic fantasy world. Plan your steps carefully while you lead an expedition to the center of a vast cluster of uncharted isles floating high in the sky.

name: Hi-Roller Battle
summary: Take to the skies in this on rails helicopter game. Your mission is to stop J-land from stockpiling weapons and taking over the world!

name: Hidden World of Art 2
summary: In the hidden object game "Hidden World of Art 2" you have to restore real classical paintings by finding hidden items and solving puzzles!

name: Hidden Cats 8: Happy New Year
summary: Explore the fairytale New Year's town while finding cute cats and paint black - white locations with colored paints.

name: Hidden Ghost Town
summary: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Hidden Objects: The Witches of Pumpkin Avenue
Himehibi: Another Princess Days ~White or Black~
summary: A sequel to both Himehibi -Princess Days- and Himehibi -New Princess Days- Zoku! Nigakki game. A popular reverse harem that the female protagonist enrolls in an all-boys school. The story features two routes of sweet romance and two routes of dark romance.

name: Highway Warriors Remastered
summary: You've arrived to the highway racing scene from watching drift comps and partaking in them with an old, slightly modified entry-level sports car, what do you do? Maybe you need to have some lessons of speed, or teach the others about cornering?

name: High School Vampire Girlfriend
summary:
Your school's sports festival is in full swing, but you’ve never been a fan. As you escape the crowd, you feel a chilling gaze…

Turning, you spot a pale girl you don't recognize. When you approach to say hi, she lunges at you!

Suddenly thrust into the treacherous world of high school vampires, can you navigate their dangerous secrets and find romance, or will they bleed you dry?

name: Hidden Cats 6: After Us
summary: Explore the continuation of this mysterious robotic world of another civilization, finding cute cats and paint black - white locations with colored paints.

name: Hidden Wonders of the Depths 2
summary: It is up to you to help your crab explore the underwater world in the hit sequel, Hidden Wonders of the Depths 2! Clear a path to the treasure chest in each level to advance to the next stage as you travel the globe. As you advance you'll play exciting minigames and fun puzzles! Bask in the beauty of the sea and experience the exciting Match 3 gameplay. Can you travel from ocean to ocean and help your friendly crab?

name: Hitme
summary: Hitme's visual novel set on Santiago de Chile. A kind of homoerotic fantasy full of fascinating colors and music. It's Friday's night, Nam's looking for someone to beat him. A suicidal act that will save his life when he meets Astra and Dei, two kind boys who will take care of him.

name: Hi Hi Puffy Ami Yumi: Genie & The Amp
summary: Available for the first time ever on Nintendo DS, Hi Hi Puffy AmiYumi: Genie & the Amp follows the fantastic adventures of two very cool pop stars from Cartoon Network’s animated rock series Hi Hi Puffy AmiYumi. The girls are way behind in recording their new album because they’ve tripped over a massive writer’s block. Luckily, they discover a genie behind a dusty amplifier who helps them battle across 10 unique time periods such as Ancient Rome and the Wild Wild West, to gain the musical notes needed to play the ultimate world tour. Fans will play as Ami or Yumi as they use their skills to solve challenging puzzles, battle scary enemies and unlock fun mini-games in single player mode or multiplayer cooperative mode for up to two players via the wireless feature for Nintendo DS.

name: Hit Confirmed
summary: Hit Confirmed is an arcade survival game and scoring.

name: High School Story: Class Act - Book 3
summary: High School Story: Class Act, Book 3 is the third and final book in the High School Story: Class Act series. It succeeds its first two books, High School Story: Class Act, Book 1 and High School Story: Class Act, Book 2. It is also the sixth and final book in the entire High School Story series that started on September 7, 2017.

name: Hidden Capybaras with Orange: Collection
summary: A playful hidden object game with capybaras, oranges, cats and magical day and night levels.

name: Higurashi When They Cry Kai
summary: Higurashi When They Cry Kai is the sequel to Higurashi When They Cry. Those 4 new and last chapters expand on the story behind the many mysteries of Hinamizawa and its characters. It's not a tragedy, just the ups and downs of life.

name: Hivaneph: The Legend of Elles
summary: Hivaneph: The Legend of Elles is an action-adventure game where every character holds a unique perspective, revealing a world that is distinct to their own eyes.

name: Hitman: Episode 3 - Marrakesh
summary: Episode Three releases for all platforms on May 31st and adds an entirely new destination to Hitman; Marrakesh, Morocco. From the busy souks and shisha cafes, to the angry mobs calling for justice outside the Swedish consulate, Marrakesh promises Hitman players the lure of voyeurism and the thrill of infiltration.

name: Hitman: Episode 4 - Bangkok
summary: Hitman: Episode 4 Bangkok sees Agent 47 touch down in Thailand as he tracks his next target to the Himmapan luxury hotel and resort, just outside of Bangkok. There, a world-renowned rock band has been recording their next highly anticipated release.

name: Hitman: Episode 2 - Sapienza
summary: Hitman: Episode 2 takes you to the sunny Italian coastal town of Sapienza, a dense location full of challenges and packed with opportunities for the creative assassin. Track down Silvio Caruso and destroy a deadly virus in this multi-layered mission. This new episode includes new challenges, targets, weapons, gear, starting locations, stash points and location mastery as well as a whole Mediterranean town to explore.

name: Hitman: Episode 6 - Hokkaido
summary:
In this climactic season finale, Agent 47 must travel to Hokkaido, Japan and check-in at the hyper-exclusive Gama facility situated on a snowy mountain peak, with breath-taking panoramic views.

Episode 6: Hokkaido includes a new story mission with new opportunities, weapons, disguises and items – plus new challenges and live content coming with Elusive Targets, Escalation Contracts, and Featured Contracts on the way.

name: Hiiro no Kakera Portable
summary: A bundle of both Hiiro no Kakera and Hiiro no Kakera Ano Sora no Shita de for PSP.

name: Hired Guns
summary:
Hired Guns takes the player to the far reaches of the Luyten planetary system. Battling through over 20 theaters of engagement, collecting weapons, scanners and food, your team of mercenaries test the limits of their military prowess in this high-tech battle adventure game.

The game features a split-screen multiplayer mode for up to four gamers, plus utilizes a unique custom digital terrain processor built for the game for realistic 3D views.

name: Hitman Go
summary: Hitman GO is a turn-based puzzle game with beautifully rendered diorama-style set pieces. You will strategically navigate fixed spaces on a grid to avoid enemies and take out your target or infiltrate well-guarded locations. You really have to think about each move and all the Hitman tools of the trade you would expect are included; disguises, distractions, sniper rifles and even 47’s iconic Silverballers.

name: Hidden Paradise: Aloha with Love - Collector's Edition
summary: Relax in paradise with fun hidden object scenes, cozy puzzles, and a light island story. Your Hawaiian getaway starts now!

name: Higurashi When They Cry Hou: Ch.2 Watanagashi
summary:
Higurashi When They Cry is a sound novel. The music, backgrounds and characters work together to create a world that is the stage of a novel for the user to read. They laugh and cry and get angry. The user takes the point of view of the protagonist to experience the story.

Nevertheless, this is a game, not a novel. As the player, you will be able to unravel the mystery surrounding the events in the game as the scenarios unfold.

name: Hidden Memories of the Gardens Between
summary: Bend time at will, as childhood best friends Arina and Frendt journey across islands filled with precious mementos from the seminal moments of their time together. Explore a captivating narrative completely reimagined for VR with 40 new puzzles scattered across the story.

name: Hidden Cats: St. Patrick
summary: Dive into the enchanting world of "Hidden Cats - St. Patrick" a hidden object game where your mission is to uncover every cat hidden within stunning hand-painted artwork. Let your keen eye and curiosity guide you through this captivating journey.

name: Higurashi When They Cry Hou: Ch.6 Tsumihoroboshi
summary: Higurashi When They Cry is a sound novel. The music, backgrounds and characters work together to create a world that is the stage of a novel for the user to read. They laugh and cry and get angry. The user takes the point of view of the protagonist to experience the story.

name: Hidden Expedition: The Uncharted Islands
summary: Hidden Expedition: The Uncharted Islands is a hidden object game and the fifth entry into the Hidden Expedition series of "seek and find" games. The gameplay is similar to previous instalments, with the focus being on finding items scattered across a diverse collection of scenes. Some items are placed in the player's inventory and need to be used in other locations to advance in the game. The game does feature some variations on the basic hidden object formula, with many hidden object scenes being two screens wide, and some items only being revealed by the manipulation of other items.

name: Hiatari Ryoukou!
summary: A visual novel based on the anime series Hiatari Ryoukou released for PC-88.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Ch.1 Onikakushi-hen
summary: On a certain day in June, someone dies, and someone else goes missing. The series of deaths is connected to the upheaval surrounding the dam construction project. A murder case that was covered up is being reenacted. Is it a conspiracy? A coincidence? Or perhaps a curse?

name: Hist Maker
summary: "Hist Maker" is an element synthesis puzzle solving game with some levels which has the function of historical education. When you are in the turbulent flow of time and see for yourself that the history of humanity is torn apart, only the historical knowledge and logical ability in your mind can help us to reshape this world.

name: Hide The Corpse: Gusimir Mansion
summary:
Welcome to Gusimir Mansion, a frightening but hilarious new level where Gus’s bizarre ancestors left behind their legacy of chaos.

Explore a creepy manor packed with strange inventions, taxidermy experiments, and questionable family secrets.
This DLC adds 8 hiding spots — two more than usual — scattered through mysterious rooms filled with animal sculptures, flickering machines, and vampire-disco vibes.

Your goal: find every hiding place to reach the best score. Watch out for the mansion’s weird physics and unpredictable contraptions — in Gusimir Mansion, even the furniture might have a pulse.

Scary? Maybe. Fun? Definitely.

name: History of Football World Cup
summary: A collection of sliding puzzle games that takes you in a journey through the history of footbal world cups.

name: Hired Ops
summary:
Hired Ops is a session-based online shooter dedicated to fierce conflicts between rival mercenary groups battling on a global scale from Russian developer AbsolutSoft. Using the latest weapons and special equipment, players take part in armed encounters, unite into private military companies, carry out contracts, build bases and aggressively compete with each other - all for the sake of domination in the world mercenary market. Players are free to choose from any of the five different fighter classes, each featuring an elaborately crafted skill system and an arsenal rich in weapon variety and weapon modifications. Hired Ops includes a diverse mix of game modes, including the "Enhanced Realism" mode. 
 
Special attention is given to the opposing clans and their strife. This opens an opportunity for players to establish a name for themselves and their forces in order to achieve supreme success in the marketplace of private military corporations.

name: Hidden Object Adventure Bundle 2
summary: Experience three thrilling stories, challenging puzzles, and fantastic worlds – the Hidden Object Adventure Bundle 2 is perfect for adventure and suspense lovers.

name: Hiding Out
summary: Find 100 pieces of a photo of the real robber in this single-screen game inspired by classic arcade games! Simple, retro-style gameplay Five modes of play Nonviolent, family friendly Anyone can play!

name: Hidden Tomatoes 2
summary: Search for 100 hidden tomatoes in a detailed city. Explore the streets, buildings, and alleys with no time limits. Can you find them all?

name: Hit! Spin! Watermelon Party
summary:
Hit! Whack! Bam! It's watermelon-smashing time!
Play solo or with friends! Watermelon fun for everyone!

name: Hippy Skate
summary: A new style of skateboarding game using a simple two button mechanic. Tap the left side of your screen to make your skater move. Hold the left side of your screen to make your skater stop. hold the right side of your screen to make your skater crouch. Release the right side of your screen to make your skater Ollie. Crouch on a downhill to give your skater a boost of speed. Release at the right time on an up hill to make your skater launch higher into the air.

name: Higurashi When They Cry Hou: Ch.1 Onikakushi
summary:
Higurashi When They Cry is a sound novel.

The music, backgrounds and characters work together to create a world that is the stage of a novel for the user to read. They laugh and cry and get angry. The user takes the point of view of the protagonist to experience the story.

name: Hit It Back
summary: The ultimate street-style cricket match has begun! In Hit It Back, you choose a team and defend your neighborhood in a 2D isometric game of brazilian urban cricket against legendary teams, all with the touch of a button. Easy to pick up, hard to put down!

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou: Complete Edition
Hiveswap Friendsim: Volume Seven
summary: Crimes? Well, you know all about those. You’ve seen some stuff in your time. One might even go so far as to call you… ”hardcore." How does one become hardcore from playing a video game of the visual novel and social simulation variety?

name: Hitm3
summary: Help your love Dei make his own movie. HITM3 is a third person, slice of life adventure where you control Nam on his days in Santiago de Chile.

name: Hired Blade
summary: Hired Blade is a tactical turn based RPG set in a medieval fantasy world. Become a warchief of your own mercenary band, recruit hired blades, take on contracts, fight bandits and monsters. Unwind in taverns to boost your squad's morale! Embrace the hard life of a true gritty sellsword!

name: Hitman 3: Dartmoor
summary: Travel to the historic Thornbridge Manor in Dartmoor, England, for a mission with a murder mystery twist. Choose your own path to your objectives or take on the role of detective to solve a murder and eliminate your target. Two birds, one disguise.

name: His Dark Majesty
summary:
His Dark Majesty is a story driven, turn based strategy game. The player controls units one at a time by selecting them with a cursor, and them moving them into place, attacking or defending other units based on turns left after moving. There are 23 Chapters to the story and 26 units in the base game; an editor was later released that allows users to create their own campaigns.

The game is well regarded in the Atari community for pushing the 8bit capabilities; although not fast action, there are good graphics, sound, responsive AI and many hours of content provided on a single disk along with the ability to generate more.

name: Higanbana no Saku Yoru ni Extra Credit
summary: Fanmade PC port of the «Higanbana no Saku Yoru ni» booklet stories by Ryukishi07, «The Inhuman Teacher», «Class Meetings At The Old School» and «Marie's Utopia».

name: Hidden Cats of Mayan
summary: In this charming hidden object game, search for over 100 playful cats concealed within stunning Mayan civilization scenes. Experience a relaxing adventure that perfectly blends feline charm with the mystique of Mayan culture.

name: High Times
summary: In a world where you can get high with no consequences, the hardest drug to get over are your exes. In this (anti) dating sim, you'll manage a café, serve special donuts that get customers high, and live out the ultimate fantasy — getting closure with your exes!

name: Hitman 3: The Eminem vs. Slim Shady Pack
summary:
Unlock a series of cosmetics inspired by The Reflection Elusive Target mission and gain permanent access to The Antithesis - A two-level Arcade contract featuring The Reflection Elusive Target.

The pack includes:
• The MC Fit
• The Prank Pistol
• Jar of Mom's Spaghetti Sauce
• Mr. Chainsaw Jr.
• The Antithesis - A two-level Arcade contract featuring The Reflection Elusive Target

And a set of cosmetics for the Freelancer Safehouse inspired by the iconic Elusive Target mission.

name: Hidden Animals: English - Spanish
summary:
Hidden Animals: English - Spanish is a relaxing hidden object game with the aim to teach you the Spanish names of animals featuring exclusive piano music.

In the game, you have 3 worlds to play. In the first one, you have to find animals by their English names, in the third one you have to find them by their Spanish names. In the second world, you see both the English and Spanish name of the animals. You can freely choose levels from the 3 worlds.

The quicker you find objects the higher score and achievement you get. By getting 3 stars completing a level you will get pieces from the puzzle of the Hidden Animals.

72 Challenging Hidden Object levels using 36 backgrounds
Language learning aspect
3 language worlds to play (English, English - Spanish, Spanish)
112 items to discover
12 dedicated piano songs for the game
Built-in Owl Eye Hint
3 Hidden Animals Fresco
More than 3-8 hours of gameplay
Building your vocabulary is about repetition. The best way to repeat words is to use them somehow and in our opinion, a game is a really good tool for that. Many of us learned English from video games. This small game is for those who likes the hidden object genre that offers a relaxing activity with a really useful feature: helping you to study Spanish.

The dedicated music of the game was made by András Illés who is a multi-instrumental musician and composer.

name: Himegashima Island
summary: Kokomi is sent to the island of Himegashima, where his cousin demands that he spend his summer making happy memories. Having grown up sheltered, there's a whole new world of things for Kokomi to experience.

name: Hidden Chibis in Combinis
summary: Hidden Chibis in Combinis is a FREE hidden object game asking you to find cute Chibis hidden in Combinis. Can you find them all?

name: Hidden Through Time: Legends of Japan
summary: This DLC includes 10 new levels ranging from Japanese temples to Sumo tournaments. It also features more than 300 new Japan themed objects and characters that will be available in the level editor upon purchase!

name: Hitman Trilogy
summary:
Get access to all three games in the World of Assassination trilogy. Embark on a globetrotting adventure and become Agent 47 in the ultimate spy-thriller story across more than 20 locations.

Unleash your creativity, track down your targets and enjoy unparalleled freedom of choice in meticulously detailed sandbox locations around the world.

This bundle includes everything you need to play the Standard Edition of each game in the trilogy.

The HITMAN Trilogy includes:
- HITMAN 1 Standard Edition
- HITMAN 2 Standard Edition
- HITMAN 3 Standard Edition

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Matsuri: Ch.2 Onikakushi-hen
summary: A remake of the original first chapter of Higurashi When They Cry.

name: Hitman: Blood Money Requiem Pack
summary:
With the Requiem Pack, you will receive special items, to enhance your performance in the field.

● Requiem Legacy Suit – don the classic, buttoned ivory white suit as seen in one of the most celebrated levels of Hitman: Blood Money.

● Blood Money Shirt and Tie – combined with the Requiem Legacy Suit, nothing beats the traditional pinstripe off-white shirt and accompanying crimson red tie.
White Rubber Duck Explosive – more than just a distraction, this small but potent device will incinerate those unfortunate enough to interact with it.

● Silenced ICA-19 Chrome Pistol – the reflective finish on this reliable favourite mirrors its deadly sophistication.

name: High Velocity Bowling
summary: High Velocity Bowling is a virtual bowling sports game available from the PlayStation Network, and available for download Via the PlayStation Store. The game was released December 6, 2007 for the PlayStation 3. The game was developed by SCE San Diego Studio's in-house studio, Team Ramrod, and published by Sony Computer Entertainment. The game was first announced at the SCEA's Gamers Day 2007 at their Santa Monica Studios. The European release date was originally scheduled for an April 2008 release, but this was then delayed until May because of the new and improved PlayStation Store, included in Firmware 2.3. The game was released in Europe on May 6, 2008. On September 21, 2010, an update made the game playable with the PlayStation Move controller.

name: Hinterland
summary:
Loot, level and build with fast paced RPG combat and strategic base building.

Can you build a vibrant settlement, lead your people to prosperity, and tame the wild Hinterland.

A variety of characters, weapons, and strategies are at your disposal -- will you lead the charge with a devastating two-handed strike, or stand behind the herder in plate mail with your trusty bow?

Choose your settlers from a huge cast of characters and arm them for defense, or give them tools for production.

Each game of Hinterland takes place in a new location with different resources, items, and challenges. Different challenges feature a range of enemies, including orc war camps, dark elf raiding parties, goblin infested mines, ruined cities filled with undead, and more.

name: Hidden Cats vs Zombies
summary: Hidden Cats VS Zombies is a hidden object game – the player's task is to find cats hidden on the map and eliminate the zombies. The game is designed in a zombie apocalypse style, but with a touch of humor.

name: Higurashi Daybreak Portable: Mega Edition
summary: This game is an update of the original Higurashi Daybreak Portable and features 3 new characters (Satoshi, Miyoko, and Okonogi) alongside new stages and several changes.

name: Hirilun
summary:
Hirilun is a time-trial-based first-person platformer in which you will explore a dark and strange city. Run, jump, glide, sprint and dash to achieve the best possible time, and compete with your friends in worldwide leaderboards.

Hirilun is a dark and strange city, full of hidden places and high buildings. Although anyone can get in, only the fastest will achieve fame.

name: High School Musical: Livin' the Dream
summary:
Gabriella must be dreaming...
Help the Wildcats find the missing instruments in time for the state competition! Play as Gabriella, Troy, Sharpay and Ryan, each with unique abilities. Explore East High while solving the mystery to find the lost instruments. Dance to your favorite songs from both movies.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Matsuri: Ch.7 Tsumihoroboshi-hen
summary: A remake of the second arc of Higurashi When They Cry Kai.

name: Hime Hibi Zoku! 2 Gakki: New Princess Days!!
summary: Sequel to Hime Hibi 1 Gakki -Princess Days-.

name: Hi-Hou-Ou: Mou Omae to ha Kuchi Kikan!!
summary:
Hi-Hou-Oh is a board game in which the player (or player since the game feature up to 4 human players to play at the same time) takes the role of a treasure hunter that will take part on a treasure hunter's tournament in which they got to get as much money as they can at the end of each board game.

The gameplay is about roll the dice and depending of the square that the player reach he can get items, treasures, earn or lose money. The player with more money at the end of the game wins.

The game features 8 different characters to choose which one the player will use during the game. There are 7 different board to play in (like Atlantis, Pyramids, El Dorado, Babel, etc)

name: Hide vs. Seek
summary: An experiment gone awry gave birth to a mischievous, shape-shifting blob of goo! A state-of-the-art tracking robot was created to protect the house. Take the role of either character and join the frantic cat-and-mouse chase as the blob sneaks through the house while the robot hunts it down!

name: Highway Noir
summary: You are an underground driver for hire, fired from the Major Crimes Agency. Rush through a busy city at night as you take on high speed getaways, dangerous street races, white knuckle pursuits and more. Don't stop until you reveal the truth about who wanted you gone

name: Hidden Cats 4: Aetherpunk
summary: Explore the continuation of this amazing aetherpunk world finding cute cats and paint black - white locations with colored paints.

name: Hidden Gems Collection: 3 in 1
summary: This bundle contains: - Warm Snow - NOOB - The Factionless - Murder Mystery Machine

name: Histoire de Lune
summary: Histoire de Lune is an indie adventure game by Suits & Sandals. Explore the kingdom of Lunaire, finding weapons, upgrades and other collectables on your way. Fight against monsters deep underground and uncover the mysteries surrounding the disaster that struck the kingdom centuries ago.

name: High School Fighters
summary:
You and your best friend have been picked on by the same bullies for as long as you can remember. One day, right when the two of you are cornered, a mysterious girl comes to your rescue and fights off your pursuers! Inspired, you immediately join her at Toushinryuu Karate Dojo.

Once you’ve taken your first step into the world of karate, you find yourself on a journey that will test your body, mind, and heart.

name: Highway Rider
summary:
Highway Rider is a free and exciting motorcycle racer that lets you dodge traffic with blazing fast speed and zoom down a busy highway, passing by cars and semis, and building up your points to become the best there is!

Escape the flashing blue lights of the police by speeding through traffic barriers and narrowly avoiding collisions. Collect tons of unlockable racers, share photos and videos of your collisions with other racers, and customize your bike in this high speed motorcycle action game. 

FEATURES:

Extreme Racing
> Dart and dodge traffic while trying to get the high score with close calls between cars and trucks!
> Use boosts to go faster and increase your scores on 4 different highways.
> Customize Your Bike
> Customize your motorcycle and give your racers their own unique style!
> Unlock all 10 characters with their own motorcycles and outfits!

Real-time Multiplayer Races
> Battle other racers in head-to-head racing games and other multiplayer games.
> Share your spectacular crashes and wipeouts with all of your friends!
> Complete online racing challenges and unlock achievements!

Fugitive Mode
> Outrun the cops and break through police barricades in this furious game of cat and mouse!

Speed junkies, slap on your motorcycle helmets and experience some high-octane racing! Zoom down the open roads and try not to crash! Highway Rider is the ultimate racing game for any motorcycle fan!

Comment below your feature requests and favorite features! We will continue to update the app with more content and features.
Follow us at @batteryacidapps or the creator at @derekarndt

name: Himawari Catastrophe!
summary:
Slice your way through the Garden of the Sun as Tenshi Hinanawi in this fast and arcadey top-down hack and slash game!

This game was made in a little over a week for Touhou Fan Game Jam 15!

name: Hina no Fuwa-fuwa Dream
summary: Challenging 2-D puzzle platformer published by Desunoya.

name: Hi-Fi Rush: Teamplay Costume Pack
summary: Give your Hi-Fi Rush crew a new look inspired by each other's styles with the Teamplay Costume Pack! After all, sharing is caring.

name: Hierofanía 2
summary:
Queen Caramela was raised by a fierce, unhappy woman, and lived under the influence of a deity of modest powers. All she wants is to keep harmful things at a distance, to live for beauty and fun, for things to continue as they are. She won't get her wish.

Hierofanía 2 is a visual novel with seven endings.

name: Higurashi When They Cry Hou: Ch.4 Himatsubushi
summary:
Higurashi When They Cry is a sound novel. The music, backgrounds and characters work together to create a world that is the stage of a novel for the user to read. They laugh and cry and get angry. The user takes the point of view of the protagonist to experience the story.

Nevertheless, this is a game, not a novel. As the player, you will be able to unravel the mystery surrounding the events in the game as the scenarios unfold.

name: Hidden Cats: Thief
summary: "Hidden Cats : Thief" is a hidden objects/hidden creatures game. The player's task is to find one hundred cute cozy cats located on the map.

name: Hidden Histories: The Principality
summary: Over sixty hidden object scenes themed around a fictional European country. 100% hidden objects, no narrative story, no adventure, no puzzles, just objects to find.

name: Hidden Objects: Coastal Hill Mystery
summary:
Coastal HIll: Dark Legends is a detective hidden object game that features character customization and monster fighting mechanic.

What would it feel like to return to your hometown and not recognize it at all? The lighthouse town you once knew as a peaceful spot has changed completely. Some forces of darkness have shrouded this place. The town has started to lose hope and it’s up to you to find all of the hidden clues and solve the mystery.

name: Highway
summary: A web simulator of Mini Arcade's Highway.

name: Hidden Pirates Top-Down 3D
summary: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Himi Nikki
summary: Himi Nikki is a Yume Nikki fangame starring Waka. Waka is a music student. For some reason she finds herself terrified to go out of her bedroom. Listening to her Music Box makes her fall under the effect of a spell cast over it. There are 3 endings, one of them is the "true end" and the other two are bad ends.

name: High Hell
summary:
High Hell is a neon-soaked, arcade-action first-person shooter from Terri Vellmann (Heavy Bullets) and Doseone (Enter the Gungeon, Gang Beasts).

Descend upon the criminal underground with an absurdly large gun and bring lethal salvation to those that have fallen from the light. Righteous fury and fancy footwork are crucial to survive an escalating, absurd series of outlandish missions. Pop brainwashed chimps, deface corporate effigies, and dismantle the business dealings of the unrepentant cartel in a vibrant remix of the classic first-person shooter.

name: Hidden Cats: Old Amusement Park
summary: Explore this mysterious abandoned amusement park in the new game Hidden Cats: Old amusement park, finding cute cats and paint black - white locations with colored paints.

name: Hidden Tomatoes
summary: Hidden Tomatoes is a relaxing hidden object game where you search for 100 hidden tomatoes in a detailed city environment. Explore the streets, buildings, and alleys at your own pace, with no time limits or pressure. Can you spot all the tomatoes?

name: Hidden & Dangerous: Action Pack
summary:
Hidden & Dangerous
The year is 1941. Your special forces team has been shot down deep inside enemy territory and it's now reliant on your cunning and tactical thinking to get them safely across the border. The odds are stacked against you. Have you got what it takes?

Hidden & Dangerous: Fight for Freedom
In 1941, Captain David Stirling gathered an elite group of soldiers and founded what was to become one of the most powerful Special Forces agencies in the world--the British Special Air Services. Only the strongest, swiftest, and most daring were allowed to join the SAS; their bravery in battle was second to none. Now YOU can become a member of the SAS! Hidden & Dangerous: Fight for Freedom adds new missions and campaigns to Hidden & Dangerous.

name: Historical Invaders
summary: The most wicked men that ever lived on earth. Authoritarians, dictators, and tyrants, from Hitler to Stalin, they are all back. Historical Invaders it's a fixed shooter game where you are the chosen one to annihilate the demons of our past and save mankind.

name: Hillary Race for the White House
summary: Obama and Hillary are neck and neck in their quest to be the next President of the United States of America. Help your candidate travel the country in an exhaustive campaign from coast to coast. You can join 3 or more similar balls together.

name: Highspeed Etoile Paddock Stories
summary:
“This time we’ll be the stars! Prima Stella’s channel begins!”

“HIGHSPEED Etoile Paddock Stories” is Prima Stella’s program featuring various information surrounding the NEX Race.

This special program features close-up footage of the drivers participating in the race.

Hikari and Akari, official ambassadors for the NEX Race known together as “Prima Stella,” bring viewers various stories about the racers’ daily lives and what goes on behind the scenes.

name: Hivemind
summary:
Hivemind is an asynchronous multiplayer puzle experience where players will need to cohordinate and cooperate in order to solve a series of logic puzzles within a room.
Each player sees a slightly different version of the game, and only by gathering the points of view from other players the puzzles may be solved.

name: H Index
summary: The Earth's poles began to change places, and this caused chaos. People sensitive to the changes become aggressive and start attacking each other. Scientific minds have created the Hindex scale, which shows the level of activity of storms on a 12-point system.

name: Hidden Objects Kids Room
summary:
Are you ready for the latest hidden object game? If you're a fan of find hidden object games for kids, you're at the right place! Hidden Objects Playground is waiting for you! Spend hours of fun while playing this excellent find objects game! Hidden object games with colorful graphics and intuitive gameplay are the right choice for you! Enter the magical hidden object world and let the adventure begin. Crack the mystery by finding all the hidden items in wonderful pictures! Search and find hidden things in beautifully designed playgrounds. No matter if you're a kid or you're an adult – this awesome hidden object game 2018 will take your breath away! Start playing today, reveal the mystery object and find it in the pictures!
1000+ objects!
Magnificent graphics!
Catchy sounds!
Hint system to help you!
Awesome zoom feature!
Hidden Objects Playground is a high quality puzzle game for all generations of players! If you're looking for seek and find hidden objects with puzzles, this awesome educational game is exactly what you need! Enter the magical mystery world of playgrounds and have tons of fun by playing hidden objects for kids! Download hidden object games and start playing today – these phenomenal find the missing objects games will help you revise your vocabulary or learn some new words and will also test your concentration! Hidden object with levels of the best design – for your entertainment only! Find hidden objects in pictures of cute playgrounds for kids – look for hidden toys, sunglasses, food, drinks, and other things in magnificent levels! If you're ready for a true hidden object adventure, buckle up for the best find objects experience ever! We guarantee that you'll spend good quality time playing this photo puzzle game! Enjoy!

name: Hillshade Farm
summary: You’ve got land, time, and a whole lot to figure out. Start small, work hard, earn what you need, and build the kind of farm you’d never want to leave.

name: Hidden Cats: Rome
summary: Explore this mysterious Ancient Rome world in the new game Hidden Cats: Rome finding cute cats and paint black - white locations with colored paints.

name: Hired Stars
summary: HIRED STARS is an isometric single player RTS game in an open, randomly generated sandbox universe. You take control of a small mercenary force. Plunder trade routes, attack pirates, fight the Empire or follow the story. Conquer or buy new ships and equipment. Recruit new captains and level them.

name: Hidden Shapes: Trick or Cats
summary: Relax and have fun with our kittens' trick or treats in Halloween-inspired monster costumes! Solve beautiful hand-drawn puzzles and be amazed by the creativity of our kittens. A beautiful puzzle created to delight you and rescue your tranquility.

name: Highway Hunter
summary:
